_(#tooltips:fortification/calendarEvent/battleResultTooltip/buildingsSeized): %(buildings)s

_(#tooltips:fortification/calendarEvent/battleResultTooltip/buildingsLost): %(buildings)s

_(#tooltips:fortification/calendarEvent/battleResultTooltip/battlesCount): %(battlesCount)s
